mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tbl_cart WHERE product_no=#{product_no} AND mem_id=#{mem_id}
mapper.select: SELECT od.order_detail_no,od.order_no, od.order_qty,od.sub_total, pro.product_no,pro.product_name, pro.product_price,pro.product_thumb_img FROM tbl_order_detail od,tbl_product pro WHERE od.product_no=pro.product_no AND order_no=#{order_no}
SELECT pro.product_name,pro.product_thumb_img,od.order_detail_no FROM tbl_product pro,tbl_order_detail od WHERE pro.product_no = od.product_no AND od.order_detail_no=#{order_detail_no}
